recipe.title: Endive with Smoked Trout and Herbed Cream Cheese
ingredients: 1/2 cup minced fresh dill (from about 3 bunches)
4 heads of Belgian endive (green and red, if available)
8 ounces smoked trout fillets, broken into 1-inch pieces
instructions: Mix first 4 ingredients in small bowl. Season with freshly ground black pepper. (Can be made 2 days ahead. Cover; chill. Bring to room temperature before using.) Separate endive into leaves. Spread small amount of cheese mixture on base end of each leaf. Top with trout piece; garnish with small dill sprig. Arrange filled leaves on platter. (Can be made 6 hours ahead. Cover; chill.)
